contact_form.form_text_label: What can I do for you?

index_page.jumbo_text: ... has been my passion for years. As a computer science student and self-taught programmer I have the knowledge to create well-designed and fast applications. If you're interested, don't hesitate to get in touch with me. I'd be glad to hear from you!
index_page.products_text_upper: There are approximately 7 billion devices connected to the internet and the number is getting bigger and bigger. Each device has a different screen resolution and size which requires websites to be fully responsive.
index_page.products_text_lower: You don't have to worry about this - all of my products are completely responsive.

about_page.about_text: My name is Manuel Neumayer and I'm a young ongoing Software Developer living near Munich. At the moment I'm still studying Computer Science and Computational Linguistics at the Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität in Munich.
about_page.CV_heading: What have I been doing in my life?
about_page.CV_2018_desc: Studies of Computer Science and Computational Linguistics
about_page.CV_2017_location: College of Further Education, Bad Tölz
